DOC.brief_summary: The effect 70 minute Pain Neurophysiology Education session Sport Therapy Students Knowledge , Attitudes Clinical Behaviour Towards Athletes With Chronic Pain
DOC.brief_title: Pain Neurophysiology Education Sport Therapy Students
DOC.detailed_description: This single-blind , randomise control trial aim investigate effect brief 70 minute Pain Neurophysiology Education session sport therapy student knowledge , attitude clinical behaviour towards athletes chronic pain . Participants select first year undergraduate postgraduate sport therapy cohort . Random number generator assign participant two subgroup . Group 1 receive control education clinical 'red flag ' . Red flags question routinely ask therapist clinical practice screen sinister pathology . Group 2 receive education call 'Pain Neurophysiology Education ' ( take Explain Pain publication ) . This mode education use neurophysiology pain explain experience , use educational tool patient , healthcare practitioner student alike . Data collection ( completion three questionnaire ) take place immediately prior , immediately education session . The change outcomes pre post intervention subsequently compare group .
DOC.criteria: 1st year undergraduate sport therapy student 1st year postgraduate , preregistration sport therapy student Enrolled Teesside University , UK . Previous detail pain education either PNE Red Flags .
